system.description:
Connection - Diamond Storm. The user can choose to use Diamond Storm at a Range of "9m Cone" until the end of their Activation.
Passive - While Misty Terrain is present, the user's Diamond Storm also causes the user to have a 33% chance of raising their SPDEF stage by +1 for 8 activations, and the user and all allies within a 10m Burst are always affected by Misty Terrain, and have the Ability Clear Body.
